description: Installation of a boiler inside the listed building and associated condensation pipe on the eastern and northern elevations. (Listed Building Consent)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun.

| The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with the drawings and documents title number(s):  Design and Access Statement; Heritage Statement; 801507 East Elevation (Proposed); 801510 North Elevation (Proposed); Proposed Floor Plan; 801506 East Elevation (Current); 801508 North Elevation (Current); Existing Floor Plan; Photos showing proposed pipe location
Reason:  For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the work permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2024). | Suitable precautions shall be undertaken to secure and protect all interior and exterior elements against accidental loss or damage during building work and no such elements shall be disturbed or removed temporarily or permanently except as indicated on the approved drawings or with the prior written approval of the local planning authority.

Reason:  : To protect the architectural and historic fabric of this Listed Building, in accordance with policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2024). | The proposed pipe shall be painted in black, matching with the existing external pipes and drains of the listed building.

Reason:  To protect the architectural and historic fabric of this Listed Building, in accordance with policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2025).
| The proposed pipe shall be carefully fixed around the existing vertical historic lead pipe, without damaging and altering it.

Reason:  To protect the architectural and historic fabric of this Listed Building, in accordance with policy 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policy HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2025).
